sentence.Network_en: Hark. I hear the returning footsteps of my love.
sentence.Network_cn: 听！我听见我爱人回来的脚步声了。

sentence.Network_en: Hark at her then! Who does she think she is anyhow?
sentence.Network_cn: 听听她! 她自以为是老几?
( 命令猎犬 ) 去! 跑!

jx.jx_en_mean: (hark back)mention or remember something from the past
jx.jx_cn_mean: 回顾（或想到）往事；提及过去

lj.lj_ly: if it was such a rotten holiday, why hark back to it?.
lj.lj_ls: 如果是那么糟糕的一个假期，你干吗还要提它呢?。

jx.jx_en_mean: To return to a previous point, as in a narrative.

derivation.yuyuan_name: middle English: of Germanic origin; related to German horchen, also to hearken

example.ex: Hark. I hear the returning footsteps of my love.
example.tran: 听！我听见我爱人回来的脚步声了。

means.word_mean: 1. listen; used mostly in the imperative

auth_sentence.content: I've shaked to hark The peewits...in the dark.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've shaked to hark The peewits...in the dark.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've shaked to hark The peewits...in the dark.

auth_sentence.content: Finally, back to kings, queens and prophets for Hark!
auth_sentence.res_content: Finally, back to kings, queens and prophets for Hark!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Finally, back to kings, queens and prophets for Hark!

auth_sentence.content: The display features gadgets that hark back to an earlier age.
auth_sentence.res_content: The display features gadgets that hark back to an earlier age.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The display features gadgets that hark back to an earlier age.

means.word_mean: (只用于hark at sb的形式)听听某人的蠢话， 看某人的傲慢样子

sentences.en: Hark at her then!Who does she think she is anyhow?
sentences.cn: 听听她！她自以为是老几？

sentences.en: ‘I need to lose some weight.’ ‘Hark at her!She’s so thin I can hardly see her!’
sentences.cn: “我需要减减肥。”“听她有多傻！她瘦得我都快看不见她人了！”

sentences.en: Some old people always hark back to how things were 30 years ago.
sentences.cn: 有些老年人老是喜欢重提三十年前的状况。

sentences.en: You can’t keep harking back to the past.
sentences.cn: 你不能没完没了地念叨从前。

means.word_mean: 使想起；和(过去的事物)相似

sentences.en: The melody harks back to one of his earlier symphonies.
sentences.cn: 这首曲子使人想起他早期的一首交响曲。
